content: this legal case involves a residential building located at 26 derventska street the case has been ongoing since january 3 2020 and has now reached its final resolution the court has decided to divide the ownership of the building with the proposer receiving ¼ and the counterparty receiving ¾ the court made this decision based on the coownership ratios recorded in the land register and the results of an expert examination that valued the property at 120642690 hrk the opposing party challenged the coownership ratios but failed to provide any evidence or reasons for their objection as a result the court ordered the opposing party to reimburse the proposer for the costs of the expert examination
